body: Ex military with combat experience or from combat MOSs with very extensive training serve as armed security at all schools across the nation. Law enforcement is too short handed to carry the job plus this would help create jobs and keep veterans circulated back into the civilian working environment. 2 armed personnel at all times at school from 1hour before school starts to the last teacher or principal that leaves the school area.
title: Have armed security at all schools across the nation who are ex military from combat MOSs or combat proven.
